tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UserActivity (
	user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	activity_type VARCHAR,
	date_time TIMESTAMP,
	product_viewed VARCHAR,
	marketing_message_sent BOOLEAN
)
CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), date_joined DATE);
CREATE TABLE activities (activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, activity_type VARCHAR(50), timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE recommendations (recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, product_id INT, recommendation_type VARCHAR(50), timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE user_activity (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE product_views (
    view_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    preference_1 VARCHAR(50),
    preference_2 VARCHAR(50),
    preference_3 VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
